verbose_text: Furthermore, short and long O antigen chains produced by an S. Paratyphi A fepE mutant did not bind IgM, but this was not sufficient for preventing ROS production, presumably because very long O antigen chains are the only surface structures long enough to cover up other IgM binding sites (XREF_FIG).
evidence: antigen chains produced by an S. Paratyphi A fepE mutant did not bind IgM
